title: Skarholmens Pall
description: Full-stack web application with secure authentication system and payment processing capabilities.
backstory: Skarholmens Pall is a comprehensive web application designed for managing financial transactions and user authentication. The project features a robust two-factor authentication system, secure payment processing, and an intuitive user interface. Built with modern web technologies, it demonstrates full-stack development capabilities with focus on security and user experience.
